plan: 1. **Pick up the pink plastic cup** from the left side of the table. 2. **Move the pink plastic cup to the center of the table** without knocking over any other cups.

subtasks.subtask: Pick up the pink plastic cup.
subtasks.subtask_reason: The pink plastic cup needs to be lifted to move it to the center of the table.
subtasks.move: Move the gripper towards the pink plastic cup and lift it up.
subtasks.move_reason: Lifting the pink plastic cup allows for repositioning it on the table.
subtasks.issue: The gripper might accidentally hit the white paper cups if not carefully controlled.
subtasks.solution: Ensure the gripper is positioned correctly before lifting the pink cup to avoid contact with the white paper cups.

subtasks.subtask: Move the pink plastic cup to the center of the table.
subtasks.subtask_reason: The pink plastic cup needs to be placed in the center of the table to complete the task.
subtasks.move: Move the gripper towards the center of the table and place the pink plastic cup down.
subtasks.move_reason: Placing the pink plastic cup in the center of the table completes the task.
subtasks.issue: The gripper might accidentally drop the pink plastic cup if not controlled properly.
subtasks.solution: Ensure the gripper is stable and controlled when placing the pink plastic cup to avoid dropping it.
